EmailTemplate.subject: Al Rayan Bank property finance application update

Dear {!Account.Salutation} {!Account.FirstName} {!Account.LastName},

The valuation report that was carried out on the property is valid for a period of six months from the date of the valuation. After this time, if your case has not completed, we will require a new valuation to be carried out and this will be at your expense.
Please note that your valuation report is due to expire in 30 daysâ€™ time. If your case does not complete within the next 30 days, we will require an updated valuation report, which may delay your completion date.

Kind regards
Al Rayan Bank
